FAQ Distributeur

Distributor FAQ

Do you sell to end users?

No. We are a B2B manufacturer and supply locksmiths, installers, and distributors only.

What is your MOQ?

50 pcs.

Which currency can you quote in?

USD or EUR.

Do you have distributor tier pricing levels?

Yes. We offer tiered pricing based on annual volume and order size. Share your forecast and we will quote the correct tier.

Is packaging included? Custom packaging/labels?

Standard packaging is included by default. Custom packaging/labels require an additional cost.

Payment terms and methods?

Standard terms: T/T 30/70. We also accept PayPal (samples), L/C, and Alibaba Trade Assurance.

Which Incoterms and lanes?

FOB / DAP / DDP for EU / US / South America / Australia.

What is your warranty period?

1-year warranty for both remotes and receivers.

OEM/ODM FAQ

What is the MOQ for OEM/ODM customization?

500 pcs.

What are the typical OEM costs and timelines?

Tooling (shell mold set incl. silicone/button parts): USD 4,800. Development fee: USD 350 (refundable on orders > 2,000 pcs). Mold lead time: 30-45 days; development: 10-15 working days. Certification if needed: CE USD 500 / FCC USD 800 / KC USD 5,000.

Pourquoi les distributeurs choisissent GateRemoteSource

Plus que des télécommandes : outils de vente, support technique et logistique fiable pour les acheteurs B2B.

OEM/ODM Project Journey

Customer-first milestones that take you from idea to repeatable production.

1

Share your idea & target market

We map SKUs, target regions, and OEMs you need to replace.

2

RF & ID design proposal (1-2 weeks)

PCB, ID, and shell options with BOM transparency and cost targets.

3

Prototype & field testing

48h sample build + feedback cycles to validate range and compatibility.

4

Certification support (FCC/CE)

Pre-test guidance, lab coordination, and documentation packs.

5

Mass production & optimization

4,000 m2 SMT + aging rooms, <0.5% defect rate, firmware tweaks as you scale.

About GateRemoteSource

Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen as a PCBA workshop, later relocated to Dongguan (2021) with a 4,000 m2 facility - now a full OEM/ODM manufacturer for the global access control market.

Our mission is to empower locksmiths and installers with high-quality, high-margin aftermarket solutions that just work.

10+ Years Experience
500k+ Remotes / Year

Our Journey

2015

Foundation

Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen, China, starting as a PCBA assembly workshop.

2018

ISO Certification

Achieved ISO certification to strengthen our quality management system.

2020

Product Milestone

Launched our first Universal Rolling Code remote series.

2021

Expansion & Relocation

Relocated our factory from Shenzhen to Dongguan and expanded the workshop to 4,000 m2.

2021

High-Tech Recognition

Awarded the China National High-Tech Enterprise certificate.

2023

Global Reach

Exporting to 40+ countries, 100% focused on B2B aftermarket solutions.
